mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_ORDER_LIST_TBL L LEFT JOIN T2_ORDER_TBL O ON L.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S.*, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_NO FROM T2_STAY_TBL S INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROOM_NO, STAY_NO, ROOM_NAME FROM T2_ROOM_TBL GROUP BY STAY_NO ) R ON R.STAY_NO = S.STAY_NO ) S ON S.STAY_NO = L.PRODUCT_NO AND L.PRODUCT_KIND = 'STAY' LEFT JOIN T2_RENT_CAR_TBL ON RENT_NO = PRODUCT_NO AND PRODUCT_KIND = 'RENT' LEFT JOIN T2_LEISURE_TBL ON LEISURE_NO = PRODUCT_NO AND PRODUCT_KIND = 'LEISURE'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T2_CART_TBL WHERE U_ID = #{uId} AND PRODUCT_KIND = #{productKind} AND PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
